mapper.select: SELECT hh.id, hh.community_id as communityId, hh.name, hh.status, hh.total_price as totalPrice , hh.unit_price as unitPrice, hh.build_area as buildArea, hh.inside_area as insideArea, hd6.name as houseTypeName, hd1.name as floorName, hd3.name as buildStructureName, hd2.name as directionName, hd4.name as decorationName, hd5.name as houseUseName, hh.elevator_ratio as elevatorRatio, hh.listing_date as listingDateString, hh.last_trade_date as lastTradeDateString from hse_house hh left join hse_dict hd1 on hh.floor_id =hd1.id LEFT JOIN hse_dict hd2 ON hh.direction_id=hd2.id LEFT JOIN hse_dict hd3 on hh.build_structure_id=hd3.id LEFT JOIN hse_dict hd4 on hh.decoration_id=hd4.id LEFT JOIN hse_dict hd5 on hh.house_use_id=hd5.id LEFT JOIN hse_dict hd6 on hh.house_type_id=hd6.id where hh.id=#{id}

SELECT hc.id, hc.name,hd1.name as areaName, hd2.name as plateName , hc.address, hc.build_years as buildYears , hc.property_price as propertyPrice, hc.property_company as propertyCompany, hc.developer, hc.build_num as buildNum, hc.house_num as houseNum, hc.average_price as averagePrice from hse_community hc LEFT JOIN hse_dict hd1 on hc.area_id=hd1.id LEFT JOIN hse_dict hd2 on hc.plate_id=hd2.id where hc.id=#{id}
